dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: Oh, ooh...!
The Backstreets of Hongyuan, where buildings crowd and cave into one another, leaving only the narrowest gaps through which the artificial sky above can be glimpsed.
The child turned her gaze upward, locking her twinkling eyes on the distant firmament.
However, in her vision entered not only the sky, but also a towering castle that had devoured countless stacks of rooms and walls to amass its bulk.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: Dost thou see that, O Adept of Hares? The castle yonder, how glorious it is!

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: Verily, 'tis the semblance of the bourne our lord hath spoken of... Thither we must make our way...!

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: Then it is a relief there is no need for us to search the perimeters to find it.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: The Psychoment user our lord commanded to retrieve must be located inside the castle.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: Yet 'tis... 'tis... Aaah...

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: Achoo! *snuffle* 'tis none other than the Backstreets of Hongyuan.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: The castle that standeth before us—'tis built so broad and high, meant to make a show of its magnificence!

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: Verily, I misdoubt the champion of justice our lord doth seek would dwell in an abode so sumptuous!

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - You Branch
dataList.content: ... What does it matter if they are just or not? Our lord has spoken. We but obey.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Chou Branch
dataList.content: Our lord also commands that we bear 32 palanquins full of treasure there.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Chou Branch
dataList.content: Surely there is someone in that castle whose worth matches the weight of the burden on our backs.
The Heishou might, from time to time, question their leash-holder's orders, but the idea of disobedience is the one thing they would never entertain. This applies to the vast majority of them.
They also tend to be indifferent to their own Packmates, much less inclined to engage in a friendly conversation with other Heishou Packs.
Perhaps that is why these cold-eyed Heishou were so aloof and unresponsive to one another even though they were tasked to travel together.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: Hehe... Rocinante, yet again do I place my faith in thee on this adventure!
The child, who seemed used to the attitude of the other Heishou, started chatting up her shoes instead...
Until the Mao Branch Adept, who cleared her throat lightly to draw the child's attention, chose to grace her with an explanation.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: Even those who have never walked in justice will be enlightened in the Way of humanity and righteousness under the banner of our lord.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: By my troth, ye noble Adepts see farther than the rest of us! Prithee, I have heard tell that all who heed our lord's teachings are tempered into paragons of justice... Is this, in sooth, the tru—aaah... aaah...

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: Aeee... aaah... *sniff* that sneeze got stuck.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: Anyhow... didst thou speak the truth?

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: Yes. Follow our lord's Way, and justice will be found in due course.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: Hmm... I recall that our lord assembled the Heishou and delivered his teachings the other day, albeit in simpler language.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: Oh... Thou speakest of that time... when we of the Wei heard naught.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: The bitter frost of that day did freeze our ears red, and not a word did we manage to hear...

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: ... I am aware that sheep are vulnerable to cold, but with so many layers of clothing in this weather, don't you feel overheated?
The Backstreets of Hongyuan trap the heat of the great fires that are lit to produce the Boluses, as well as the body warmth of the passersby that walk through the alleys.
Of course, asking a hundred people on the street won't all yield the same answer, as what counts as hot or cold varies depending on the person, after all.
But here where the heat gathers, the child would probably be the only one to say it's freezing cold—like her Packmates who were all cooped up in their quarters.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: 'Tis cold... 'Tis so, so very cold.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: The chill doth seize my bones... Verily, I fear I shall be turned to a frozen statue ere long...
The child continued to shiver as though she were dropped in the middle of a snow field.
And that... is one of the effects of the Wei Bolus, the same trait shared by an enigmatic Outskirts creature that Hongyuan's Pack of Sheep stems from.
The creature in question, you see, can suddenly grow—or rather, burst out—heavy layers of fleece from its skin due to its sensitivity to the cold.
And along with that trait, another of its physical features was woven into the effect of the Wei Bolus: the tough, sturdy horns that the child and her Packmates possess.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: ... I have come to discover that the Wei's tolerance for cold is far lower than I had expected. I am learning something new every day.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: I give thanks for thy fellowship in my misery... Oh, I would not deny a warm cup of tea on a day such as this...
The child, busily surveying the flashy signboards along the Backstreets, paused in her tracks when one of the shops caught her eye.
There had to be patrons coming in despite the hot weather,
because the dumpling joint was adding to the heat with steam rolling from its wide-open doors.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: *sniff* Ooh! That's...!
Entranced by the sight of steamers stacked above head height, the child happily skipped across the road...

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: Uh... Um...
... only to trudge back looking dejected, her hand awkwardly fumbling over her padded clothes.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: P-pray, might any soul here purchase for me but five dumplings...? Only five...

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: Purchase them yourself.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: ... These clothes bind me so. I am unable to reach my pocket.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: Verily, should I cast off but a single layer... I shall perish of the bitter cold forthwith...

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: I can buy some for you, but I doubt it will help you feel any warmer.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: Any heat your meal provides will immediately be extinguished by the effect of the Wei Bolus.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: *shiver* Aye, I know... yet my spirits will surely... Achoo!

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: By the way, whither goest thou, Sir Rooster?

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - You Branch
dataList.content: ... I'm goin' back to the inn. Call me when the mission starts.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - You Branch
dataList.content: There's no fun where there's no fight.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Chou Branch
dataList.content: I don't think all the dumplings the shop has to offer could sate the hunger of us oxlords.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Chou Branch
dataList.content: We'll get our own dinner at a kezhan somewhere and return to the inn.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: Ehhh...? Cold as winter's breath, every one of you... Our quest beginneth in the dark hours of the night. We shall meet then...!
The ox and the rooster left without an answer.
As soon as the two were out of sight, the child, timid as she was, shamelessly begged the Mao Branch Adept:

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: ... Ahem. Lady Adept... I beseech thee this favor, then...

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: If... if five be too many, then perchance two...? N-nay, one! Buy me but a single dumpling, and my thanks are thine!

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: I... am not a cheapskate. Please have as many dumplings as you like.
After some time...

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: Ooh, the castle! It doth exceed mine expectation!

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: A-and 'tis yet too cold, forsooth...

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: P-pray tell, am I alone in feeling this... chill?

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: The weather is so hot that even a short walk feels suffocating... and then it's suddenly snowing now.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: I know our venture doth begin at nightfall... but is it wise to bring down the castle now?

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: It should be fine. This castle... is not an approved residential area.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: It won't be considered a breach of the City's Taboo.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: Verily, 'tis a comfort that the roosters shall keep the Sweepers at bay...

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: Yet such a mighty castle as this... 10 sheep alone cannot hope to cast it down apace.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: Not to worry. You don't need to destroy the entire castle. The Mao Branch will guide you to the walls that need breaking.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: And, should the need arise, the Chou Branch will assist you with your task.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Chou Branch
dataList.content: ... Can't deliver the palanquins without a way ahead.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Chou Branch
dataList.content: These walls... we're pushing, but they won't budge.
X Corp.'s alloys and P Corp.'s construction technology.
The City's protective technologies have progressed in tandem with its destructive ones.
However... only those in the uppermost echelons of the society, with enormous wealth and influence to match, can enjoy the benefits of these technologies.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: ... 'Tis fashioned merely of snow and rock... yet it withstandeth our blow like structures shielded by Singularities.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: To think that one with no station in any Wing nor companies should own such a castle and bend weathers to their will... How is such a thing possible?

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: Precisely. That is why our lord has need of them—

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: Psychoment users.
And that is also why E.G.O and Distortions were able to cause such a sweeping change in the City.
Simply by heeding the call of their hearts... even those without a single coin to their name could gain the strength to protect themselves.
But...

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: ... Will you be able to handle this?

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: Hmm...

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: Hmmmm...
Unfortunately, the human will cannot always overcome the heights of technology.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: ... I think so. Prithee, let us hear our lord's commandment!

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: Very well... This is the decree of our lord.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Mao Branch Adept
dataList.content: "The Heishou of the Wei Branch... are to submit to the leash-holder's command and open the way."
No sooner had the words fallen on the child's ears than horns started to force their way out of her arms with a sickening crack.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: Hrrk... Gah...!
The horns then extended, spiraling and digging into the siege weapon in the child's hands, binding it tightly to her arms.
Even as her face twisted in pain, the child's eyes darted restlessly around her...
The same way her Packmates' did.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: Our lord's commandment... approacheth.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: H-hark...! It draweth nigh! W-we must hasten!
When the leash-holder issues a command, the sheep are gripped by the sense that something is chasing them from behind.
The command must be obeyed. The approaching terror must be eluded.
Only when those two thoughts alone remain to drive their minds can the pack of sheep finally stampede ahead to crush and shatter all that stands in their path.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: Forth... Battering Ram Horns(衝破角)!

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: Battering Ram Horns! Forth!

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: Shatter...! *slam*

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: Crush...! *slam*
A tremendous force focused on one spot brought the wall crashing down. With heavy breaths, the child advanced slowly...
While her horns continued to snake under her skin.
The tougher the obstacle, the more their strength surged. Nothing could impede the march of the Wei.

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: I must hurry onward...

dataList.title: Heishou Pack - Wei Branch
dataList.content: Farther, farther onward.
